channel.title: ~Project Destiny - New 474 Runescape 2007 Remake!~
channel.description:
Come relive your old Runescape days here. We offer a kind and welcoming community and Mods who are trustworthy and responsible. Server is a 2007 remake. The server will have all skills up to Hunter. Current xp rate is 12x, and will be dropped once we've gained more players! Mods are in the progress of coding quests, and the Hunter, Farming, and Construction skills. Most if not all sounds are added for actions. There is no tutorial island as of right now... If you have more questions ask a mod on the forums, or in game.
Forums - http://rune-shiver.com/forum/forum.php Webclient - http://www.rune-shiver.com/webclient/webclient.html Downloadable Client - http://rune-shiver.com/forum/forumdisplay.php?fid=22
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b0iZRRxYCw4[/youtube]
Some available quests: 1. Cook's Assistant 2. Doric's Quest 3. Imp Catcher 4. Lost City 5. Priest In Peril 6. Rune Mysteries 7. Sheep Shearer 8. Tree Gnome Village 9. Witch's Potion
So come check us out today!

Come relive your old Runescape days here. We offer a kind and welcoming community and Mods who are trustworthy and responsible. Server is a 2007 remake. The server will have all skills up to Hunter. Current xp rate is 12x, and will be dropped once we’ve gained more players! Mods are in the progress of coding quests, and the Hunter, Farming, and Construction skills.
